name: Penne with Tomatoes And Basil
keywords: basil, penne, tomato, main course, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: A large bunch of basil leaves, torn into small pieces
Course salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the penne in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and place in a large bowl with the olive oil. Cover.
Add the tomatoes, garlic and basil, season and mix well. Serve immediately, passing the cheese separately.
